name: getVariablesInRoom
shortDescription: Returns all variables of a room
description: This method returns all variables of a room.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The ID of the room as returned by createRoom() or getRooms().

returnValue: Returns variables assigned to the specified room. The root element is a Struct with all peer IDs as key and all channels as value (Struct). The channels again have the variables as value (Array<String>).
